prompts: Create a digital Pokemon that resembles a geometric figure with unique colors and shapes.
Imagine a futuristic Pokemon that glows and has a sleek, angular design.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a computer-generated creature with a playful demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that features bright colors and has a robotic appearance.
Generate a digital creature that combines vibrant hues with a compact build.
Make a Pokemon that embodies technology and has an abstract design.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that appears to be made of pixels and shapes.
